channel.title: User does not exist

item.title: User does not exist
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yea, you’re not storing them.

In the PlayerHandler class, declare this.

public ArrayList<String> jailedUsers = new ArrayList<String>(100); //max of 100 jailed people

Then import this.

import java.util.*;

Then on the Jail code, add this after the “You have jailed” thing.

server.playerHandler.jailedUsers.add(p.playerName.toLowerCase());

Then on the unjail code, add this.

server.playerHandler.jailedUsers.remove(p.playerName.toLowerCase());

Then all you have to do for the jailed is this.

if(server.playerHandler.jailedUsers.contains(p.playerName.toLowerCase())){ isJailed = true; //Or somethin }

Read full topic

item.title: User does not exist
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >=1 ) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }
        if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
		sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.description:

}
if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
		sM("You have released "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); [/code]

Sad face. Someone fix it
